params.newTotalSupplyTwab: Updated TWAB of tickets total supply after a successful total supply TWAB recording.

params.delegate: The recipient of the ticket power (may be the same as the user).
params.newTwab: Updated TWAB of a ticket holder after a successful TWAB recording.

Delegated(address,address).notice: Emitted when TWAB balance has been delegated to another user.

NewTotalSupplyTwab((uint224,uint32)).notice: Emitted when a new total supply TWAB has been recorded.

NewUserTwab(address,(uint224,uint32)).notice: Emitted when a new TWAB has been recorded.

userdoc.notice: ERC20TWAB is an experiment. Implementing time-weighted average balances on more ERC20 tokens. Credit: PoolTogether Inc (Brendan Asselstine)
